I am trying to enhance JUnitEE to work with Junit 4 but I can't find 
any g=
ood examples of creating a custom runner based on 4.x from end-to-
end. Can=
 anyone directly me to a primer that will help? 

I would also be intereste=
d in any servlet based runners that have been 
developed (couldn't find tho=
se either). I know that Junit 
is "extendable", but I don't see any clear d=
ocumentation of what 
classes to extend, and how to link them together (and=
 I don't really 
have time to walk through all the Junit source).

** btw, =
No, I'm not trying to test servlets - there are lots of tools 
for that, JU=
nitEE is the only Servlet runner I've ever seen and I want 
to run my test =
within a full J2EE container (no mocks). Unfortunately 
no-one has updated =
that project for 4.x.

TIA
